main event: An unidentified flying object was reported over Ardmore, Alabama, on November 7, 1967. The object was described as a small, bright, and luminous entity that made a sharp right-angle turn before speeding away.
interesting points: The object was observed hovering for approximately 15 minutes., It appeared to come from the north and traveled in a straight line., The object was noted to have a glowing color with black tips and a red middle., Ground observers described the object as metallic and round in shape., No photographs or reliable identification were reported from traffic control or local authorities regarding this sighting.
sighted object: a small, bright, and luminous object
witness description: The witness reported observing the object while out hunting and noted its lack of noise and unusual movement.
